commands.command.play.description:
Starts playing the music set by the user
As a cloud with music is [**Yandex Music**](<https://music.yandex.ru>)
commands.command.play.examples.0.use: play A Sky Full of Stars
commands.command.play.examples.0.desc: Run a search for the song `A Sky Full of Stars` and it will prompt you to choose the desired author.
commands.command.play.examples.1.desc: Launch the song from the specified link.
